Configuration Models
===================

.. automodule:: geminisdr.config.config_models
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Data Classes
------------

SystemConfig
~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. autoclass:: geminisdr.config.config_models.SystemConfig
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   Main system configuration containing all subsystem configurations.

HardwareConfig
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. autoclass:: geminisdr.config.config_models.HardwareConfig
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   Hardware-specific configuration for device selection and resource limits.

MLConfig
~~~~~~~~

.. autoclass:: geminisdr.config.config_models.MLConfig
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   Machine learning configuration for training and inference parameters.

LoggingConfig
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. autoclass:: geminisdr.config.config_models.LoggingConfig
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   Logging system configuration for output format and levels.

PerformanceConfig
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. autoclass:: geminisdr.config.config_models.PerformanceConfig
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

   Performance optimization configuration for memory and resource management.
